articles.author: Layli Foroudi, Zhifan Liu
articles.title: France evacuates citizens from Niger after neighbours warn of war - Reuters
articles.description: France began the evacuation of hundreds of French and European citizens from Niger on Tuesday, a day after neighbours Mali and Burkina Faso said any outside intervention to restore the ousted government would be seen as a declaration of war.
